content: this listing is an original pattern written in english using american terminology to crochet your own amigurumi pattern includes detailed instructions to instruct you on how to make a crochet toy step by step skill level intermediate the pattern will be available for download immediately after payment has been cleared y patterns are non-refundable but please contact me with any questions or concerns you will need fundamental crochet skills to complete this pattern do not resell distribute or publish this pattern you can sell the physical items
